title: Navigate forwards to a listbox in reading mode
task: Navigate forwards to a listbox
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the listbox
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the listbox.
assertion2: Text 'Choose your animal sidekick' is conveyed
assertion5: Text of the focused option in the listbox, 'Cat', is conveyed
assertion7: Position of the focused option, 1, is conveyed
assertion8: Number of options in the listbox, 11, is conveyed
